metadata.title: CVE-2020-13662 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Open Redirect vulnerability in Drupal Core allows a user to be tricked intovisiting a specially crafted link which would redirect them to an arbitraryexternal URL. This issue affects: Drupal Drupal Core 7 version 7.70 andprior versions.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
